title: Glamorous Voice
original_name: 共鳴―グラマラス・ヴォイス―
sinopse:
One day Kento, a vocalist in a small band, is scouted by a talent agency to become a part of a professional band. The problem is, he knows the guy that the band is going to be centered around, the prodigious Takatou Karou....and does not like him a tiniest bit?

(Source: MU)
